publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1323 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Ayr Show-That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the Ayr Show; notes that, despite poor weather, the show had an increase of 20% in takings; further notes that visitor numbers were up with a larger than normal number of townspeople attending; recognises the role that shows such as this play in the rural life of Scotland, and sends best wishes to all show winners.
S2M-1323 Ayr Show (lodged on 17 May 2004) Alex Neil*
S2M-1323 Ayr Show (lodged on 17 May 2004) Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-1323 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Ayr Show-That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the Ayr Show; notes that, despite poor weather, the show had an increase of 20% in takings; further notes that visitor numbers were up with a larger than normal number of townspeople attending; recognises the role that shows such as this play in the rural life of Scotland, and sends best wishes to all show winners. Supported by: Alex Neil, Tommy Sheridan
S2M-1323 Ayr Show (lodged on 17 May 2004) Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1323 Ayr Show (lodged on 17 May 2004) Elaine Smith*
